allowModifyStatement.description: Allow modifying SQL statements after issue is created.

allowSelfApproval.description: Whether to allow issue creators to self-approve their own issues.

autoEnableBackup.description: Whether to automatically enable backup for database changes.

autoResolveIssue.description: Enable automatic issue resolution when tasks complete.

ciSamplingSize.description:
The maximum number of database rows to sample during CI data validation.
 Without specification, sampling is disabled, resulting in full validation.

dataClassificationConfigId.description: The data classification configuration ID for the project.

enforceIssueTitle.description: Enforce issue title to be created by user instead of generated by Bytebase.

enforceSqlReview.description:
Whether to enforce SQL review checks to pass before issue creation.
 If enabled, issues cannot be created when SQL review finds errors.

executionRetryPolicy.description: Execution retry policy for task runs.

forceIssueLabels.description: Force issue labels to be used when creating an issue.

issueLabels.description: Labels available for tagging issues in this project.

labels.description:
Labels are key-value pairs that can be attached to the project.
 For example, { "environment": "production", "team": "backend" }

name.description:
The name of the project.
 Format: projects/{project}

parallelTasksPerRollout.description: The maximum number of parallel tasks allowed during rollout execution.

postgresDatabaseTenantMode.description:
Whether to enable database tenant mode for PostgreSQL.
 If enabled, issues will include "set role <db_owner>" statement.

skipBackupErrors.description: Whether to skip backup errors and continue with data migration.

state.description: The lifecycle state of the project.
state.title: State

title.description: The title or name of a project. It's not unique within the workspace.

webhooks.description: The list of webhooks configured for the project.
